name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Samuel LEWIS, Appellant; COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Clair Winfield YOUNG, Appellant

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Samuel LEWIS, Appellant. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Clair Winfield YOUNG, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Judgments of Sentence are affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: George E. Lepley, Jr., Asst. Public Defender, Karl K. Baldys, Williamsport, (court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert F. Banks, Kenneth D. Brown, Asst. Dist. Attys., Lycoming, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
casebody.head_matter:
441 A.2d 1212
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Samuel LEWIS, Appellant. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Clair Winfield YOUNG, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 21, 1982.
Decided March 10, 1982.
George E. Lepley, Jr., Asst. Public Defender, Karl K. Baldys, Williamsport, (court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert F. Banks, Kenneth D. Brown, Asst. Dist. Attys., Lycoming, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
